fields.name: AlertSensitivity
fields.description: The extent of deviation required to trigger an alert. This will affect how tight the threshold is to the metric series pattern.

fields.name: FailingPeriods
fields.description: The minimum number of violations required within the selected lookback time window required to raise an alert.

fields.name: IgnoreDataBefore
fields.description: Use this option to set the date from which to start learning the metric historical data and calculate the dynamic thresholds (in ISO8601 format)

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: The operator used to compare the metric value against the threshold.
